title: Northfield Falls, Vermont
text: Northfield Falls is an <a href="unincorporated%20area">unincorporated</a> village in the town of <a href="Northfield%2C%20Vermont">Northfield</a>, <a href="Washington%20County%2C%20Vermont">Washington County</a>, <a href="Vermont">Vermont</a>, United States. The community is located along <a href="Vermont%20Route%2012">Vermont Route 12</a>, north of the <a href="Northfield%20%28village%29%2C%20Vermont">village of Northfield</a> and south-southwest of <a href="Montpelier%2C%20Vermont">Montpelier</a>. Northfield Falls has a <a href="post%20office">post office</a> with <a href="ZIP%20code">ZIP code</a> 05664.
